com.bumptech.glide.load.engine.cache

Class ExternalPreferredCacheDiskCacheFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bumptech.glide.load.engine.cache.DiskLruCacheFactory
      • com.bumptech.glide.load.engine.cache.ExternalPreferredCacheDiskCacheFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DiskCache.Factory

    public final class ExternalPreferredCacheDiskCacheFactory
extends DiskLruCacheFactory
    Creates an DiskLruCache based disk cache in the external disk cache directory, which falls back to the internal disk cache if no external storage is available. If ever fell back to the internal disk cache, will use that one from that moment on.

    Images can be read by everyone when using external disk cache.
